<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 86 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made of elemental salts and essences from the [Inner Sphere](/Rules.aspx?ID=307) or where such planes leak onto the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1), _fundamental oil_ is anathema to [elementals](/Traits.aspx?ID=57) and other creatures with a weakness to elemental damage. A weapon anointed with this oil acts as _[bane oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2068)_ to elementals, but the damage type is the same as the target's greatest weakness if the target has weakness to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. If it has none of these, the additional damage is the same type as the weapon's damage type. These effects last 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
